text: Futhi abakholwayo besilisa nabakholwayo besifazane abanye babo bangabangane babanye bagqugquzela ngokwenza okuhle banqabela okubi futhi benza imithandazo futhi bakhokha izakaah bahlonipha uMvelinqangi nesithunywa sakhe, labo uMvelinqangi uyoba nomusa kubona ngempela uMvelinqangi uphakeme ngamandla unobuhlakani
